Tap and swipe here
to move

Tap on the device when
its glowing to activate it

You have to reach the Light
Tower on the right direction

Tap to get the colour of
the Light with your staff

Tap on the portal
to teleport

You will need specific light colours
to activate some elements
Find the three Orbs of each world!
Swipe on the left side of the screen to move
Tap on the right side of the screen to jump
You can't activate the Light Tower with your feet!
Activate the devices when they are glowing
Get enough Orbs to unlock new levels
Collect every coin to reach the highest score

Jump to the upper side, or fall to the bottom side,
and you will find a new perspective of the world
Use the portals to reach remote areas

If you can't activate the Light Tower,
find an Altar where light your staff
